content.text: I am looking for a new home, I have a dog and a snake so I need a place with enough room for both
I have a snake and a cat, I love reptiles! I am looking for a new place too
That is funny, maybe we should look together
Yeah, that would be awesome! My favorite thing to do is watch cooking shows, but I never actually cook. What do you like to do?
I love to be outdoors, but I also enjoy working out and going to the gym. I work in the medical field and I love helping animals in need.
That is great! I am looking for a job in the medical field, I love helping people
What kind of animals do you have?
I have a snake named Noodle and a cat named Mittens
What kind of snake is Noodle?
He is a ball python, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
